title: Windmill
author: Windmill Labs <contact@windmill.dev>
tagline: Open-source developer platform to build production-grade workflows and UIs from scripts.
postInstallMessage:
Windmill has been installed!

Default superadmin credentials (use these for the first login, even if SSO is configured):
*   **Username:** `admin@windmill.dev`
*   **Password:** `changeme`

Access Windmill at [$CLOUDRON_APP_ORIGIN]($CLOUDRON_APP_ORIGIN).

After the first login, you will be prompted to create a new superadmin account and workspace. You can then configure OIDC for SSO if desired under instance settings.

**Note:** This app requires Cloudron superadmin privileges to install and run, due to the use of the docker addon for LSP and worker containerization.
